Xhtml 1 0 Now A W3c Recommendation

27 Jan 2000

The World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) has officially launched XHTML 1.0 as recommendation.

You can read the full spec or read more about it.

The W3C Validator has also been upgraded to check XHTML 1.0 syntax.
